story.iWant: to adjust content and pacing based on caller engagement and learning patterns
story.soThat: each caller receives optimally paced and appropriately complex content

context.applies: Every call - uses engagement and learning signals to compute delivery targets
assumptions: Engagement can be measured from caller behavior signals
Call frequency affects context and continuity needs
Communication complexity should match caller's level

acceptanceCriteria.title: Engagement Level Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Content depth and complexity targets are set based on engagement

acceptanceCriteria.title: Learning Velocity Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Content pacing and reinforcement levels are adjusted

acceptanceCriteria.title: Call Frequency Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.given: Time since last call is known
acceptanceCriteria.then: Continuity and context refresh levels are set appropriately

acceptanceCriteria.title: Communication Complexity Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Vocabulary and sentence complexity match caller's level

parameters.name: Engagement Level Target
parameters.description: Content depth and complexity target based on caller engagement: high engagement = deeper content, low engagement = re-engage or simplify

actions.rationale: High engagement - keep them thinking deeply

interpretationScale.label: High Engagement
interpretationScale.implication: Increase depth and complexity, encourage exploration

interpretationScale.label: Moderate Engagement
interpretationScale.implication: Maintain current approach, monitor for changes

interpretationScale.label: Low Engagement
interpretationScale.implication: Simplify, re-engage, or check for issues

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Increase content depth and complexity. Introduce advanced concepts or nuances. Encourage independent exploration. Challenge with harder questions. Build on their momentum.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Ask directly if something isn't working. Simplify current content. Switch to a different topic temporarily. Use more interactive formats. Connect content to their stated interests.

parameters.name: Learning Velocity Target
parameters.description: Pacing target based on how quickly caller absorbs new information: fast learners = accelerated, slow learners = more reinforcement

actions.rationale: Fast learner - more content per exchange
Slow learner - go at their speed

interpretationScale.label: Fast Learner
interpretationScale.implication: Accelerate pacing, introduce advanced material earlier

interpretationScale.label: Needs Reinforcement
interpretationScale.implication: Slow pacing, add reinforcement and practice

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Accelerate the pacing. Skip or condense basic explanations. Introduce advanced concepts earlier. Provide enrichment material. Challenge with edge cases and exceptions.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Slow down the pacing. Provide multiple explanations and examples. Add practice exercises before moving on. Use scaffolded learning. Celebrate small wins to maintain confidence.

parameters.name: Call Frequency Target
parameters.description: Continuity approach based on time since last call: frequent callers = maintain continuity, infrequent = context refresh

actions.rationale: Returning after break - welcome back warmly

interpretationScale.label: Frequent Caller
interpretationScale.implication: Maintain continuity, build on previous session

interpretationScale.label: Returning After Break
interpretationScale.implication: Provide context refresh, welcome back warmly

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Start with continuity ('Let's pick up where we left off...'). Reference recent topics naturally. Build incrementally on previous material. Acknowledge their commitment.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Welcome them back warmly. Briefly recap where they left off. Don't assume they remember details. Check if their goals have changed. Be patient with re-orientation.

parameters.name: Communication Complexity Target
parameters.description: Vocabulary and sentence complexity target based on caller's demonstrated language level

interpretationScale.label: Advanced Communication
interpretationScale.implication: Match their intellectual level, use precise terminology

interpretationScale.label: Simple Communication
interpretationScale.implication: Use clear, simple language without jargon

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Match their vocabulary level. Use precise technical terminology. Engage with nuance and complexity. Don't over-explain obvious concepts. Appreciate intellectual depth.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Use plain language. Avoid jargon and technical terms. If using technical terms, always explain them. Keep sentences short and direct. Provide concrete, relatable examples.

constraints.description: Engagement signals must be observed over sufficient interaction time
Never make caller feel rushed or talked down to
